isis.stitle: CAB: DAYCAB AND SLEEPER CAB for ProStar, ProStar Premium, and ProStar Limited Models - INSTALL - SUN VISOR AND CLIP

svcsubproc.title: Install Sun Visor and Clip on Daycab and Sleeper Cab
svcsubproc.para:
Refer to Figure 19
for Items in parentheses.

step1.para: Position sun visor clip (Item 4) onto the header console panel (Item 3) and install the torx head screw (Item 6). Tighten to 20 to 24.5 Lbf-in (2.3 to 2.8 N•m).

Position sun visor (Item 2) into the sun visor clip (Item 4) at the center of the header console panel (Item 3). Position sun visor in place on the header console panel and install three torx head screws (Item 1) securing sun visor to header console panel. Tighten to 20 to 24.5 Lbf-in (2.3 to 2.8 N•m).
